title: Activity·Problem·Project-Based Anatomy and Physiology Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology and medical terminology, along with fundamental smartphone proficiency
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric, resource-constrained technological environment, applicable to Spanish-Korean linked learning strategies within the language domain.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core anatomical terminology for each body system with over 80% accuracy by connecting it to daily life.
Learners perform a step-by-step physiological mechanism analysis process via problem-based scenarios with a 90% completion rate.
Learners can analyze real medical cases through team-based mobile projects and write learning reports utilizing linguistic analogies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
